com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers
Class VectorialAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.VectorialAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReadableVectorial
Direct Known Subclasses:
VectorialDBAdapter, VectorialDefaultAdapter, VectorialDisconnectedDBAdapter, VectorialFileAdapter
public abstract class VectorialAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadableVectorial

Clase padre de los adaptadores de los drivers. De momento mantiene solo el índice creado sobre la capa

getFeature

public IFeature getFeature(int numReg)
                    throws ReadDriverException
En la implementación por defecto podemos hacer que cada feature tenga ID = numero de registro. En el DBAdapter podríamos "overrride" este método y poner como ID de la Feature el campo único escogido en la base de datos.

Specified by:

numReg -

getFeatureIterator

public IFeatureIterator getFeatureIterator(java.lang.String[] fields,
                                           IProjection newProjection)
                                    throws ReadDriverException
Description copied from interface: ReadableVectorial
Returns an iterator over all the features of the vectorial data source. It applies a relational algebra "projection" operator (selects the specified fields). It the param newProjection is not null, it reprojects all the returned features to this projection

Specified by:
getFeatureIterator in interface ReadableVectorial
Parameters:
fields - fields we are intested in of the data source
Returns:
feature iterator whose features has as attributes the specified fields
Throws:
ReadDriverException

getFeatureIterator

public IFeatureIterator getFeatureIterator(java.lang.String sql,
                                           IProjection newProjection)
                                    throws ReadDriverException
Return a feature iterator from a given sql statement.
In this case, the statement will have the "projection" operator (select campo1, campo2, ...etc) and the "selection" operator (where ....)

Specified by:
getFeatureIterator in interface ReadableVectorial
Parameters:
sql - statement which define a filter
newProjection - new projection for the returned features (if not null)
Returns:
feature iterator
Throws:
ReadDriverException

getFeatureIterator

public IFeatureIterator getFeatureIterator(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D rect,
                                           java.lang.String[] fields,
                                           IProjection newProjection,
                                           boolean fastIteration)
                                    throws ReadDriverException
Makes an spatial query returning a feature iterator over the features which intersects or are contained in the rectangle query. Applies a restriction to the alphanumeric fields returned by the iterator.

Specified by:
getFeatureIterator in interface ReadableVectorial
Parameters:
rect -
fields -
Returns:
Throws:
ReadDriverException

getSpatialIndex

public ISpatialIndex getSpatialIndex()
Description copied from interface: ReadableVectorial
Return the spatial index of the adapter. Responsability of create spatial index instances is of the FLyrVect class, but adapters need these index to build spatial query iterators.

Specified by:
getSpatialIndex in interface ReadableVectorial
